scenes.description: Ouro Kronii introduces the award ceremony on stage.
MC Kronii reviews the tonight's performances while showing a grid of the nominees.
MC Kronii presents the golden Kronii trophy and introduces the first nominee.
Qronii gives her acceptance-style speech for the Best Act award.
MC Kronii interacts with Qronii and introduces the next nominee, Singronii.
Singronii gives her modest and slightly emotional speech for the Best Sing award.
MC Kronii wishes Singronii luck and introduces Funnyronii.
Funnyronii gives an aggressive and comical speech for the Best Comedian award.

subtitles.original: It's lucky for you guys or...
subtitles.english: It's lucky for you guys or...

subtitles.original: ...unlucky? I don't know.
subtitles.english: ...unlucky? I don't know.

subtitles.original: But anyway, let's move on to the award ceremony!
subtitles.english: But anyway, let's move on to the award ceremony!

subtitles.original: Woohoo! Let's go!
subtitles.english: Woohoo! Let's go!

subtitles.original: And there we have it!
subtitles.english: And there we have it!

subtitles.original: Those were all the performances we had for tonight.
subtitles.english: Those were all the performances we had for tonight.

subtitles.original: What a... amazing turnout.
subtitles.english: What a... amazing turnout.

subtitles.original: As expected from me, obviously.
subtitles.english: As expected from me, obviously.

subtitles.original: Now now, if our fabulous guests are lucky...
subtitles.english: Now now, if our fabulous guests are lucky...

subtitles.original: ...they might have the chance of grabbing...
subtitles.english: ...they might have the chance of grabbing...

subtitles.original: ...this absolutely glorious Kronii statue...
subtitles.english: ...this absolutely glorious Kronii statue...

subtitles.original: ...endorsed by, again, me, Kronii.
subtitles.english: ...endorsed by, again, me, Kronii.

subtitles.original: And oh, it's so shiny.
subtitles.english: And oh, it's so shiny.

subtitles.original: Gosh, I wish I could get one.
subtitles.english: Gosh, I wish I could get one.

subtitles.original: But I'm not participating, so... oh well.
subtitles.english: But I'm not participating, so... oh well.

subtitles.original: But with that, let's hear from the nominees, their thoughts...
subtitles.english: But with that, let's hear from the nominees, their thoughts...

subtitles.original: ...on their stunning performances tonight.
subtitles.english: ...on their stunning performances tonight.

subtitles.original: To start us off, let's hear from Qronii.
subtitles.english: To start us off, let's hear from Qronii.

subtitles.original: BEST ACT Qronii
subtitles.english: BEST ACT Qronii

subtitles.original: Qronii
subtitles.english: Qronii

subtitles.original: I felt a little bit of heat towards the end...
subtitles.english: I felt a little bit of heat towards the end...

subtitles.original: ...but I really do feel like I conveyed the feelings of Kronii...
subtitles.english: ...but I really do feel like I conveyed the feelings of Kronii...

subtitles.original: ...very much so.
subtitles.english: ...very much so.

subtitles.original: At the end of it all, I truly believe all Kroniis...
subtitles.english: At the end of it all, I truly believe all Kroniis...

subtitles.original: ...are beautiful in their own respective ways.
subtitles.english: ...are beautiful in their own respective ways.

subtitles.original: These amazing qualities of mine...
subtitles.english: These amazing qualities of mine...

subtitles.original: ...understanding, humble, and most of all, attractive.
subtitles.english: ...understanding, humble, and most of all, attractive.

subtitles.original: Oh, what defines me as a supreme overlord.
subtitles.english: Oh, what defines me as a supreme overlord.

subtitles.original: Everyone loves me because who wouldn't?
subtitles.english: Everyone loves me because who wouldn't?

subtitles.original: They should all bow before my raw awesomeness.
subtitles.english: They should all bow before my raw awesomeness.

subtitles.original: And because of that, and only for that reason...
subtitles.english: And because of that, and only for that reason...

subtitles.original: ...I deserve the award.
subtitles.english: ...I deserve the award.

subtitles.original: Ah, slaaaay!
subtitles.english: Ah, slaaaay!

subtitles.original: Thank you, Qronii. How humble of you.
subtitles.english: Thank you, Qronii. How humble of you.

subtitles.original: Wow. Um, I think... but I love the apple, by the way.
subtitles.english: Wow. Um, I think... but I love the apple, by the way.

subtitles.original: Can I... can I touch it?
subtitles.english: Can I... can I touch it?

subtitles.original: Ooh. Oh my God, that's... that is amazing.
subtitles.english: Ooh. Oh my God, that's... that is amazing.

subtitles.original: That is fresh. Damn.
subtitles.english: That is fresh. Damn.

subtitles.original: Ooh. Okay, I'm too mesmerized.
subtitles.english: Ooh. Okay, I'm too mesmerized.

subtitles.original: Anyway, up next is Singronii. Let's hear it!
subtitles.english: Anyway, up next is Singronii. Let's hear it!

subtitles.original: BEST SING Singronii
subtitles.english: BEST SING Singronii

subtitles.original: Singronii
subtitles.english: Singronii

subtitles.original: I feel like I tried to do my best.
subtitles.english: I feel like I tried to do my best.

subtitles.original: Um, I hope it shows and... um...
subtitles.english: Um, I hope it shows and... um...

subtitles.original: ...you know, I guess for that effort...
subtitles.english: ...you know, I guess for that effort...

subtitles.original: ...it would be an honor to receive the award.
subtitles.english: ...it would be an honor to receive the award.

subtitles.original: But, uh, if not, that's... that's okay.
subtitles.english: But, uh, if not, that's... that's okay.

subtitles.original: Um, I guess I'll just try harder next time.
subtitles.english: Um, I guess I'll just try harder next time.

subtitles.original: Um, I mean, I've been practicing...
subtitles.english: Um, I mean, I've been practicing...

subtitles.original: ...uh, so you know, maybe next time I'll do much better...
subtitles.english: ...uh, so you know, maybe next time I'll do much better...

subtitles.original: ...and... win.
subtitles.english: ...and... win.

subtitles.original: I guess I just gotta do better. Just just do better, right?
subtitles.english: I guess I just gotta do better. Just just do better, right?

subtitles.original: Heh. Yeah. Yeah.
subtitles.english: Heh. Yeah. Yeah.

subtitles.original: Um, anyway, I should just pass it over to the next person. Yeah.
subtitles.english: Um, anyway, I should just pass it over to the next person. Yeah.

subtitles.original: Singronii, we wish you luck on your idol journey.
subtitles.english: Singronii, we wish you luck on your idol journey.

subtitles.original: And I see what you did there with the idol outfit.
subtitles.english: And I see what you did there with the idol outfit.

subtitles.original: Clever, very clever. Cute, too. Ooh.
subtitles.english: Clever, very clever. Cute, too. Ooh.

subtitles.original: Okay, she looks like she's about to cry...
subtitles.english: Okay, she looks like she's about to cry...

subtitles.original: ...so let's just move on right here, okay?
subtitles.english: ...so let's just move on right here, okay?

subtitles.original: Funnyronii, let's hear what kind of words you have to say...
subtitles.english: Funnyronii, let's hear what kind of words you have to say...

subtitles.original: ...about today's performance.
subtitles.english: ...about today's performance.

subtitles.original: BEST Comedian Funnyronii
subtitles.english: BEST Comedian Funnyronii

subtitles.original: Funnyronii
subtitles.english: Funnyronii

subtitles.original: If you don't think that I deserve it...
subtitles.english: If you don't think that I deserve it...

subtitles.original: ...then I think you need to have better taste in humor...
subtitles.english: ...then I think you need to have better taste in humor...

subtitles.original: ...because you lack common sense and any reason...
subtitles.english: ...because you lack common sense and any reason...

subtitles.original: ...an average human is supposed to have.
subtitles.english: ...an average human is supposed to have.

subtitles.original: And besides, did you see the Kroniis?
subtitles.english: And besides, did you see the Kroniis?

subtitles.original: They seemed to have liked it.
subtitles.english: They seemed to have liked it.

subtitles.original: Like, I mean, they were literally jumping at the opportunity...
subtitles.english: Like, I mean, they were literally jumping at the opportunity...

subtitles.original: ...to be part of the performance.
subtitles.english: ...to be part of the performance.

subtitles.original: And sure, they ended up in the hospital and they're suffering...
subtitles.english: And sure, they ended up in the hospital and they're suffering...

subtitles.original: ...um, and all that fun stuff, but that's entertainment for ya...
subtitles.english: ...um, and all that fun stuff, but that's entertainment for ya...

subtitles.original: ...you know? No pain, no gain.
subtitles.english: ...you know? No pain, no gain.

subtitles.original: And there was a lot of gain to be had.
subtitles.english: And there was a lot of gain to be had.
